longTitle.p: COUNCIL DECISION (EU) 2020/255of 17 February 2020on the conclusion on behalf of the Union of the Agreement between the European Union and the Government of the People's Republic of China on certain aspects of air services

formula.name: actingEntity
formula.p: THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

citation.p: Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 100(2), in conjunction with Article 218(6)(a) thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the European Commission,

Having regard to the consent of the European Parliament
Consent of 15 January 2020 (not yet published in the Official Journal).,

recital.p:
In accordance with Council Decision (EU) 2018/1152
Council Decision (EU) 2018/1152 of 26 June 2018 on the signing on behalf of the Union of the Agreement between the European Union and the Government of the People's Republic of China on certain aspects of air services (OJ L 210, 21.8.2018, p. 1)., the Agreement between the European Union and the Government of the People's Republic of China on certain aspects of air services (the 'Agreement') has been signed, subject to its conclusion at a later date.
The objective of the Agreement is to bring bilateral air services agreements between 27 Member States and the People's Republic of China in line with Union law.
The Agreement should be approved on behalf of the Union,

content.p:
The Agreement between the European Union and the Government of the People's Republic of China on certain aspects of air services (the 'Agreement') is hereby approved on behalf of the Union
See page 3 of this Official Journal..

The President of the Council shall, on behalf of the Union, give the notification provided for in Article 6(1) of the Agreement
The date of entry into force of the Agreement will be published in the Official Journal of the European Union by the General Secretariat of the Council..
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
